Items.Title: Report of the Committee on Rules, Privileges, and Elections

Report of the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections approving the appointment by the Mayor of  ROBERT BRIAN TIERNEY as a member of the New York City Landmarks Preservation Commission

The Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections, which was referred to on November 7, 2002, respectfully

REPORTS

Pursuant to sections 31 and 3020 of the New York City Charter, the Committee on Rules, Privileges and Elections, hereby approves the appointment by the Mayor of ROBERT BRIAN TIERNEY as a member of the New York City Landmarks Preservation Commission to serve for the remainder of a three-year term that expires on June 28, 2004.


Res. No. 621

RESOLUTION APPROVING THE APPOINTMENT BY THE MAYOR OF ROBERT BRIAN TIERNEY AS A MEMBER OF  THE NEW YORK CITY LANDMARKS PRESERVATION COMMISSION

By Council Member Comrie

RESOLVED, that pursuant to sections 31 and 3020 of the New York City Charter, the Council does hereby approve the appointment by the Mayor of ROBERT BRIAN TIERNEY as a member of the New York City Landmarks Preservation Commission for the remainder of a three-year term that expires on June 28, 2004.
Items.MatterName: M 330 - Robert B. Tierney, Landmarks Preservation Commission
